mapper.select:
/** * Query ID : selectWorkList * Description : workList 조회 * Author : 박태혁 **/
SELECT B.DB_SVR_NM , A.AGT_CNDT_CD , TO_CHAR(A.STRT_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS STRT_DTM , A.ISTCNF_YN FROM T_AGTCNDT_I A , T_DBSVR_I B WHERE A.DB_SVR_ID = B.DB_SVR_ID
AND B.DB_SVR_NM LIKE '%' || #{DB_SVR_NM} || '%'
ORDER BY A.LST_MDF_DTM DESC
